summary: Tested new features for iteration 63: Business Profile verification tiers, Featured Sellers section, NaNkm fix, and region search bar visibility. All backend API tests pass (10/10). Frontend features working correctly.
seed_data_creation: None needed - used existing test profile 'test-electronics-store'
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features from iteration 63 are working correctly. Featured Sellers section correctly hides when no verified sellers exist. NaNkm bug is fixed - lat/lng validation added at line 1121 in index.tsx. Region search bar in LocationPicker is visible and functional (lines 464-479). Premium badge support implemented in public business profile page.

homepage_nanKm_fix.details: No 'NaNkm' text appears on homepage. Lat/lng validation added at line 1121 in index.tsx: !isNaN(selectedCity.lat) && !isNaN(selectedCity.lng)

featured_sellers_empty_state.details: Featured Sellers section correctly hidden when no verified sellers (empty state). Component returns null if featuredSellers.length === 0

featured_sellers_api.details: GET /api/business-profiles/featured returns correct structure: {sellers, total, premium_count, verified_count}

business_directory_api.details: GET /api/business-profiles/directory returns correct response with pagination and filters

premium_tier_support.details: Backend supports is_premium and verification_tier fields. API responses include premium_count and verified_count

public_profile_premium_badge.details: Public business profile (/business/[slug].tsx) shows correct badge - Premium (diamond icon, #FF8F00) or Verified (checkmark, blue)

region_search_bar_visibility.details: Region search bar visible in LocationPicker when selecting region. Search input with placeholder 'Search regions...' at lines 464-479

business_edit_page.details: /business/edit page loads with all form fields: Business Name, Description, Categories, Phone, Email, Address, City, Country, Logo upload
